title: Officer careers in the army
creator_credit: Geoffrey Thompson, Dept of Army and Australia. Royal Air Force. Films Advisory Bureau
brief_description: Shows the training of young men at Duntroon Military College in Canberra and the Officer Cadet School in Victoria. Aspects of training such as the science and principles of war, military engineering, artillery and field training are depicted.
creator_credit_for_label: Geoffrey Thompson, Dept of Army and Australia. Royal Air Force. Films Advisory Bureau
